place_description: Counter-serve bakery/cafe chain serving sandwiches, salads & more, known for its bread & free WiFi.

reviews_data.review_text: Fast and good

For the past decade, I have ordered Panera catering with confidence.  The menu items are generally  consistent across all restaurant locations.  No surprises. We like to have the valentine cookies catered in for our office staff.  The cookies are usually well decorated which adds to their high quality appearance.  They usually  look exactly like the pictures displayed on the Panera website, however this year's order was a complete failure and such a disappointment. This was a poorly delivered joke. I was embarrassed to serve the cookies.  At $500 for 200 catered cookies, I truly wanted to throw them away.   The appearance of the cookies was unsightly.   The royal icing formula was off and the icing never set.  The icing was very  thick, wet and sticky upon arrival.  The icing smeared everywhere inside the wrapper so much so that it was difficult to try to remove the cookie from the wrapper without getting icing on our hands.  Additionally,  the Panera staff decided to get creative with their own personal designs which was also a complete failure.  The cookies looked as if they had been decorated by young children.  These were no where near professionally decorated cookies.  More than 75% of the cookies were not presentable for a corporate event.  Not sure what happened to Panera's quality control but this will be our last Panera order of any kind .  Attached is a single photo of the assorted valentine cookies pulled from the website,  and the remaining photos are of the cookies we received from the Panera Uptown Charlotte Location on College Street.  This is not what I expect from a professional catering company, especially when the order was placed a few weeks in advance.  ( Update:  We think these  cookies were decorated with cinnamon roll icing. After a full day and night, the icing never did set and is way too thick for royal icing.  The decoration just slides right off the cookie.  It's either cinnamon roll icing or the staff didn't use the correct recipe)
This Panera takes forever to prep food. They tell you your food will be ready in 15 mins max and proceed to have you waste your entire lunch break for 45 mins.

Delicious!  Delicious!  Delicious!  Customer service is always fantastic as well. Go and enjoy some cheddar and broccoli soup with a piece of delicious bread or a bagel, and the brownies are so delicious!  You can go wrong with the selections at Panara.
Pretty good food a little pricy for what your getting though
We had a great time with this place in Downtown Charlotte North Carolina

Terrible experience.   The guy that took our order argued with us and wouldn't SELL ME avocado with my bagel.    I had to purchase another product and take avocado off that.     The bagel was not cut or toasted.   My wife got an egg sandwich and she said very bland.    I guess we need to just be Starbucks people.    Not surprising restaurant was almost empty in Sunday morning at 10am.

The moment we walked to the door, it was misleading. The hours on the door said closed on Sundays but online it said open til 2pm. We tugged the door and it did open but the place seemed closed which was confusing. The shelves were completely empty and there was no one at the front desk but we saw customers which was so confusing.  We had to ask a customer how they ordered and eventually someone came to the front. The staff seem like nice people. But service was very slow. Plus my hot food order was cold and they forgot our pastry. They also didn't put our food on plates, they packaged it to go which made us feel like they wanted us to leave, Even though it was only 1230 and they supposedly close at 2... not the best experience but overall the food was fine ish.
Panera never disappoints!!!
They are too pathetic to be open for supper hours. This location obviously has extremely incompetent "management" to make such a stupid decision.
Favorite place for lunch.

#panerabread #poorservice #rapidpickup

Order# 6051715741500674
Order Date: Jun 4, 2024 10:15am ET
Issues:
1) Ordered whole sandwich, received only half.
2) Customized the order, but received standard sandwich
3) Rapid order notification said "ready" but it wasn't. As a result I got late to my appointment.

When we eat at Panera, we expect higher standards and customer satisfaction.

Called the store manager, who didn't took the call seriously and passed it down to someone else. The other person, Barbara, came in hot and just said she'll refund the order without acknowledging or apologizing for the mess-up and the issue it caused. That's when I decided to leave a review.

This location and the manager fell short.

Consistently not good experience or food, very slow, usually out of things. I try it every couple months because it's near my office and then usually regret it. NOTE TO SELF: Don't do it! Go somewhere else
Good food and great customer service

The bagels are always delicious, but the entire dozen I ordered has been sliced so unevenly, one half is thinner than a piece of bread. It's happened more than once when I've ordered a bagel pack, I don't understand how this can be done wrong. Just disappointing.
Waited long time for order very rude staff

Super convenient for office workers, this Panera is only open weekdays and only from 7am to 4pm. There's no dawdling here on a weekend with a coffee and a laptop.

Inside, the usual menu of sandwiches, salads and soups. Plenty of seating in different configurations. Of course, the wifi is only good for a short while because Panera is not looking for you to sit here all day with your laptop.

There are tables outside with umbrellas where you can sit on a nice day and hopefully no one lights up a cigarette to ruin it. There is metered street parking and paid parking lots nearby.

Do not order takeout or pick up from this specific location. I placed on order in my app for pick up at noon and when I got there during my lunch break my order was nowhere to be seen so I figured it was done yet even though the app said it was ready. I came back again after 10 minutes and my order was still not there. When I asked about my pick up they told me someone took my order and didn't bother letting me know. It was well over an hour by now and they remade my order only to give me 2 of the wrong items. They gave me a different sandwich and the wrong size soup. Other Panera's have been fine but this location is lacking a lot.
This is more on quality of food. Breakfast just doesn't taste good, but this is based on quality of ingredients.  Corporate do better!!!!
Posted hours are super short (closed Saturdays??) And doors were locked during posted open hours.

I am order frequently when I am at work. Today is no different. I ordered a you pick two and the order was placed at 2:04pm, ready for pick up at 2:14pm. I walked from work on my lunch break to pick up my order. When I arrived, me and another guest were there to pick up and the cashier told us both they closed early because it was slow...knowing they had orders coming in. They cancelled both our orders with not so much as a notification or warning. Yes, I understand Thanksgiving is tomorrow...but it is TOMORROW. Google has their hours until 4:00pm today. If you want to close early, that's fine. But make it known. So not only did I not get my order, but I had to get back to work. Thanks Panera team for your Fabulous Customer Service.
You have lost my business!!
Took a while to get my food

I like Panera. I ordered a pick two, the creamy tomato soup and chicken frontega sandwich every time.  This time,  I'm really disappointed,  look at my picture of the sandwich.  The price went up,  but the ingredients lessen.  A total of $17 with tips and what I got is just bread. So disappointed.
Always have great service in the morning.
Nice pastry, ok coffee. Mostly self-service!
Panera disappointed this visit. I ordered the Toasted Frontega Chicken. When I opened the wrapping the Chipotle sauce was slathered everywhere. It was extremely messy.
Great customer service!
All employee there are great and are very nice. They always greet you as you enter in. Fast with superior service.
Yummy food.  Friendly service.

I ordered a steak and white cheddar sandwich online. It was a 15 minute walk to pick it up. Got back to my office and it was some sort of chicken sandwich. I could not go back because, I had spent 30 minutes of my hour lunch already. I ate the sandwich and it was pathetic. Wilted lettuce and there was barely an ounce of meat on this sandwich. Pretty sure the steak sandwich would have been the same. Poor quality and service. Supply chain is no longer an excuse. Panera and other restaurants are robbing people of their hard earned money. $13.20 + $1.80 tip. = $15 gift card wasted. Mind you, I never eat there on my on dime nor when they cater to the office. The only thing they have going for them is their French baguette!

I walk 3 blocks to pick up lunch at least once a week. Recently quality control is in decline. Last week I barely got any a salad dressing with my to go green goddess (1/3 of a tiny container). This week the didn't put the bread in with my soup. I only get their soup because of the roll. Tried to call but a computer answers and can't get a human, so here is my feedback. Shorting customers is not a good business model.
No pude comer hoy porque el horario esta incorrecto aqui en maps, en mi primer viaje a Charlotte si pude y estuvo delicioso
Awesome
The self ordering system needs a lot of improvement. Extras added to order got missed. Staff non existent
I have watched  Zacariya help improve this location immensely. She is very friendly, professional, hard-working and keeps the restaurant clean and well stocked!!! Thanks Panera for hiring her!!!
Every chair in the place is put up on the table, no one behind the register, and no sign of any breakfast sandwiches, quiches, or non-bakery items of any kind on the menu

I ordered online from this location through the Panera app and made some substitutions for my food due to a medical dietary restriction, my food came completely wrong and now I physically cannot eat it. I tried to call but the phone continuously disconnected after a few rings. Very upsetting.
Ordering from their catering menu is so easy and their delivery person is awesome.
This place was great!!!
A person can damage many things in your business! Woman with a very bad attitude, the place is perfect.
Ordered the BBQ chicken sandwich online, the food was ready on time when I got there and really good, but it came in two tiny sandwich "halves" so order the full sandwich if your hungry.
Super long wait for Doordash orders, stop wasting people's time, turn off the app if you can't handle it.

This is the second time incident has happened at this location with my food with the employees because of their unprofessional mannerism this needs to be address by upper Management A.S.A P I ordered a Sausage Scrambled egg cheese ciabetra and the way it came out was sloppy and messy
SLOOOOOOOOOW!!  If you want to dine in, manually enter your own order, then wait 30 mins for your food -- then I highly recommend.  If you're looking for quick casual dinning, this ain't it.
Food is usually fine but they are CONSTANTLY out of bread. It is really frustrating.

Ordered at the kiosk, got a text that my order was ready, when I went to pick it up not only did they not have it ready, but they didn't have the order at all. Told them what it was supposed to be, and they gave me a cup of soup instead of a bowl. Not impressed.
Not open as listed. Save your time.
Love the variety
Poor value, mediocre taste, shoty service, no wifi
Super neat spot to eat/study in uptown Charlotte.

Great food. Nice clean restaurant. Courteous friendly workers.
I wish to have a Panera in Puerto Rico.

Okay two star because I had great customer service and also they were patient and helped me with my order. So I got the spicy chicken sandwich and my side was a soup. Start off with the soup which was great and then I went on to my sandwich, I took finally looked down because the texture wasn't right and I wish I hadn't. I felt bad for my coworker because she saw me spit everything out . The chicken breast doesn't look fully cooked or sat in blood... idk
Overpriced, coffee was gross, order was wrong and waited for forever.

This place closed their doors during the Omega Psi Phi convention that brought/spent $10,000,000 in Charlotte, during a 3 day span. Shame on you Panera. Those were educated men who came to your city and was greeted with closed doors!

This location is 2 blocks from the convention center which was having a 3 day event with thousands of people. However they ran out of everything by 9:30 for breakfast. It was like they either ran out of bread or eggs, not sure which. They should keep up with major events in their area and adjust. There aren't many places near the convention center to eat breakfast.

BEWARE!!! I'm not familiar with other Panera locations, but the one in Uptown Charlotte on College St is practicing outrageous deceptive pricing. Their menu sign boards above the order stations state one price, but your bill is - literally - TWICE what the menu board states. A small (half) Fuji Apple Salad is listed at $4.69 on the board yet is $8.69 when you pay the bill! And that salad, for $9+ with tax, is so tiny, in a 4"x6" box, it wouldn't supply lunch for a child. When I realized the differential, I asked the manager for a printed menu to see what pricing is listed there, and he replied that there are none. I have reported this to the BBB and will take the complaint to Panera corporate.
Good, consistent good choices and service.
Slow
Ordered a cold brew and was given a cup and told me cold brew was just iced coffee.  Please train your people.

Blonde girl with glasses at the pickup was extremely rude to me and my girlfriend for no apparent reason. Luckily another nice woman working with her apologized on behalf of her which made me regret my high tip a little less. food was alright tho...

Etwas unpersonlich, aber eine der wenigen Moglichkeiten zu fruhstucken .
Vieles ist geschlossen wegen corona.
There is 10 min parking outside to pick up food ordered via the app. If you want to dine in, you'll need to park and walk.
I always like Panera. I get them same soup but switch up sandwiches.  Love the soup, but don't really care for the sandwiches. You got to try the cranberry muffin.
Friendly staff
Love there food

Customer service was awesome
Coffee amd food were amazing.
Excellent staff!
My to go place for coffee and bagel

I order the French Onion soup a couple days a week when I'm short on time.  It is always slightly different, but always good.  To me, this says that a human concocted it.  I like humans.  I like Panera's food.
Their broccoli and cheddar soup is the best
Personally I prefer coffee from Starbucks or Dunkin'
Omgg the steak breakfast sandwich is amaaazing!!
The front office guy David was very helpful .
Food is alright
Visit Panera (almost) daily for my bosses lunch - staff is always very friendly and helpful!
Modern Greek Salad with Quinoa is a must for vegetarians or vegans. I've always had a good experience here.
Good food .....a little slower than normal
Grear
mac and cheese creamy
Broccoli cheese soup.  Yes.  Love Panera!
Panera never dissapoints. My soup was delicious.
Food was delivered to my table very fast. I was able to order from a kiosk. Food was great as always. New side of fresh fruit! Yes!

Usual great Panera Bread items but needs better management for the location. It's not as clean as some other ones, it normal for this store to run out of some bakery items before noon. Sanitation and restroom are questionable
They get my order right most of the times. Love the mobile order an drapid pickup option...best way for rapid pick up, to beat the lunch hour rush.
Great Cust Service Uptown Charlotte location. Young lady in bakery was nice. Everything but the sink cookie is excellent and big enough to share
Very good
Courteous staff

Nice location and friendly service. Standard Panera location but often times that's what is great about it. Can be pricey for certain food, but in the relative uptown location it is comparable.

Great spot!

Speedy service and ordering with the tablets up front is quick and easy! However, I have been to this location many times and 50% of the time they are out of the bread that comes optionally with salads and which they use to make several of their panini sandwiches. This is Panera BREAD...how can they always be out of bread? I would understand if this were an issue occurring later in the evening after their lunch rush, but they have been out of bread at all times of day AND on multiple days in a row. Get your supply chain figured out and put the "bread" back in Panera Bread.
The food was great after a long walk through uptown. I like the convenience of this location. Nice service by the cashier.
Soups good, I personally think the sandwiches are a little overpriced for what you get (not a reflection of this store- just Panera in general)
Always a pleasure
Good but expensive

The service was fast, the food was delicious, and the establishment was clean. This is one of the best Panera Bread locations I've visited out of many. Chicken salad and fruit was fresh. Thank you for a pleasant experience.
Panera Bread? It's the best place in the world if you just came from a long trip. Get the chicken panini, or if you're a kid, get the turkey sandwich. That bread is
Great soup and sandwiches. Never disappointed, each time I visit the States/Canada I look forward to have a meal here.
Nice place, fresh food (had a choco croissant and pecan bread), coffee+refill, reasonable prices. Thank you!
Incorrect orders: sandwiches with hummus get mustard instead, etc. Fruit flies *everywhere*, including in food. Inedible.
Great Panera location.  Super friendly staff.  Clean.  Seating outside.
It is a very busy place during lunch hours. Plan ahead
Do yourself the favor of grabbing a bite from this location, if there's seating open outside grab a spot and enjoy it.

Not just sandwiches. Panera offers a rotating selection of soups, salads, breakfast items, and a bakery. Your best bet here is to order online because it is busy for breakfast and lunch if you're dining Monday through Friday. Evenings and weekends are pretty quite. This is a very nice location that's usually very clean and staff are very helpful. As always if you found my review helpful please take a moment to hit the , Thanks!
Fabulous Food
Friendly staff and good food. Best place to grab a meal if you are in a hurry
service was rlly nice and quick, the place was clean and the workers were extremely sweet
Very expensive, for small portions of food.
Muito bom, padaria Americana....
Me encanta
Panera Bread,if you want healthy nutritional food this is the place to go,pick two is no brainer,Broccoli Cheddar Soup is one of my favorite choices.
Great Service!
Some great vegetarian options.
Lesser quantities for it's prices.
Great place and great service
Love the cinnamon rolls!!
Love me some Panera bread!
Decent place.
Quick, friendly, professional, and polite. Will definitely visit again.  Asiago cheese bagels are yummy!
Great spot for lunch in Uptown Charlotte. Online ordering is a must if you need lunch during high peak times.

I love Panera Bread! This location was pretty nice. My husband ordered a regular coffee but they did not have a fresh brew of Dark Roast, mentioned it to one of the staff and she got it made for him- really sweet about it. Awesome staff and nice environment.

This is a very busy Panera, which is understandable. Over 10,000 people work uptown Charlotte and Panera is a hotspot for lunch/catering. After most Paneras took away sweet tea...even though we are in the south...i said i would never go back to Panera for that very reason. Even though there is a pump for fake liquid sugar its disgusting and unsanitary and just not the same.  How many hands touch the pump? Today the fake sugar was out at lunch. Last visit there was no toilet paper in the bathroom at lunch. Tables arent wiped down often enough. 1 team member should just be wiping, checking, and stocking all lunch.
On the other hand great food always.

Fresh ... Everything? Yes mam yes sir. Everything fresh u can see it u can taste it. Feel good about what you're eating . Panera is known for bread duh... But did u know they made it really fresh? They have several great recipies for signature or special dishes.all you have to do is ask for the menu. Very reasonable prices. Remember when eating better usually u pay better
Good location,  great service
Love the food.@ Panera...this.location did not handle.The crowds from a.convention well at all
Terrible!!!! Its like they staff it with zombies
Panera is Panera.

I like Panera Bread. This is a great location. Good atmosphere and clean. The menu choices are not my favorite as there are only 2 options that I like. The pastries are very nice and their coffee is on par.
Ask for chips but got bread in my to go. Worker restocking forks with bare hands and not even by the handle. Gonna give them 3-6 months to work on things and try again next fall maybe.
Store ran out of bread at 12:30 pm on a Saturday. I like Panera Bread but really? Ran out of bread? This store must have lost thousands in revenue that afternoon.
Went to this location they had one cashier on the register with a line going out the door I had to end up leaving with no lunch for my break thanks
Using the app made this order quick during a busy time due to our career conference. Everything was excellent, fresh, and quick.
Great food!!
They were out of greens, cucumbers and avocados. Very bummed.
Great location  -  food is a known delicious & the service was top notch.  Helpful, friendly, & witty - we enjoyed lunch & coffee hang out. Clean area & an outdoor patio area as well.
If you love bread, clean eating and the smell of a bakery then this is a stable to eat at. Now keep in mind budget though some items can be pricey. Enjoy the green life!!!
Great pastries
The Ten Vegetable Soup gave me the needed pick me up during a rainy and gloomy day.  The lemon wheel gave the soup an added touch of flavor.
Always good soup and Sammie time
Food wasn't prepared correctly had to take it back!  Not organized.
I get what I was expecting
The food is ok
Excellent service
I love eating at Panera Bread and also love their cinnamon cake yummy
Their 4 cheese Souffle for breakfast is heavenly. Another healthy item on breakfast menu is granola yogurt with fruit and honey.
Nice atmosphere but the cookies were over priced
Not clean for seating
delicious and crowded
Pick 2 was yummy with soup & Baja Mac & Cheese. It was takeout (takeaway for foreign foodies) so maybe that explained the tiny portions, but felt slighted in light of cost.
Good quality, plenty of seating space. Staff is very friendly.
As always great food and good quality.
Mmmmm, smells heavenly!!!

Twice I've been here. The second time I visited the service has been substandard. The cashier didn't get my order correct. If she had a problem understanding me she should have asked me to repeat my order or repeat the order back to me.
Great food
I Love the place
This place has very good onion soup! The bagels are good too.
Great staff.  Heathy, fresh food.  I love the French onion soup and the desert bakeries.
Love there food and pastries
The atmosphere was nice and I liked the way it was decorated and the eating area spaced out. The food was great and filling, and the people very friendly. I would go there again
I ordered a capachino and was given coffee filled with foam. BAD!!

This specific panera is awful. Avoid it like the plague if you want your order to be correct or on time. It's a recurring problem to that our office will no longer be having panera for any event. The managers claim that they will fix it but they don't get that at the point I'm calling them. It's far too late for that
Friendly! And good food.
I love the food in this place, they have healthy and delicious options, you can use the automated system to order and pay
Fantastic customer service, and very quick

There was only one cashier during the afternoon lunch rush and the cashier appologized for inconvenience and directed customers to the kiosk to order food. My food came out fast and it was really good. The dining area was clean. I will vist again.
The people are nice. One of the few chains i actually like. Bakery is good. App makes ordering easy. Really enjoyable.

This location of Panera Bread is excellent. I was pleased by the fact that there was a placard with a number listed loaned to me for easy service. Food I ordered was brought to me on a glazed ceramic with napkins along with a ticket order receipt.
Fantastic day
Can't go wrong with Panera
Amazing breakfast
Good Food, Nice Staff, Great Pastries

abdolutely the worst experience. No one up front to great. No coffe mugs. No coffe, all urn out.
Would recommend running to the nearest restaurant for a better meal and service.
Its panera
Great food

Always good.  Salads, Sandwichs & Soup's yummy to the tummy.  I like it in the fall & winter. (Fireplace) toasty toasty
The kids will love the cookies
Snagged a spicy Thai chicken salad and enjoyed it.
Just so expensive for small portions. I mean food is ok some times just bland and not much of it.
Love
The full size salad is almost too large to eat.
Their Hazelnut coffee is my fave

Came here for a downtown dinner and the location was perfect. Easy to to find and a short walk from the Embassy Suites hotel and NASCAR museum. We were greeted and quickly placed our order.

The food was very typical of other PBs so no surprises! The quality was just as good as others.

I can highly recommend this location when staying or working in the downtown Charlotte area!
The hot coffee from the canisters are often only warm, and the cold brew is sometimes warm.
iekhC/iellieit C/udztsmieia dzieianiC/ie giaieat C/sffieie aoiedzsmie dzaioiC/niedz
Yummy
people are soo kind and service is good
Great food healthy and good customer service
Always a good choice. Healthy and indulgent options.

I love panera but seriously how are they going to serve something like this? I thought the avocado turned black because the chicken was hot, but unfortunately it wasn't the case. It was already decomposing. Hopefully next time I go they have something fresh.
Ordered breakfast sandwich online and my order was ready and waiting at the time I expected, however they left off some veggies that I specifically requested when I ordered.
Just fantastic! My fiance and I do love Panera in general but wow, awesome service by any measure.
Love their chicken noodle soup!

It takes forever to get thru the lines! Not to mention most of the staff is just standing around and the bathrooms are located at the back of the store where you get your food which means you have to fight the line waiting to even get to them and watch the swinging door near the bathrooms the staff loves to fly out it and can take you out of your not moving quick enough
Flies in eating area. Long hair in our baguette. Employee that brought food was friendly, but others seemed annoyed we were there.
Fast service. Friendly cashiers.
I love this place. They know me by name here and are always friendly and warm. Great service and food always.
Great location.  Plenty of seating inside and outside the restaurant, decent food, and friendly staff.  Never seems that busy.
Good food
Customer service was wonderful it was my very 1st time going to Panera Bread love the experience
Varieties of breakfast.

Don't bother customizing. It never comes out right. No cheese on a breakfast sandwich please? Nope sorry it's all melted on every single time. They are on auto pilot back there.  3 stars because front staff are fabulous.
So friendly and such a peaceful environment. Staff is great

Put in an order through the app for a Bagel pack and it was supposed to be ready at 8am.  I get there at 8:10 and it's not only not ready, they are out of most of the bagels.  This is not the first time this has happened.  I have had many issues when I used to get lunch here as well.  I expressed my displeasure to who appeared to be the manager and he was very dismissive and mildly rude.  Enough is enough, I'll have to shop elsewhere.

Typical Panera Bread.  This one seems to be lacking on power outlets though.  Wifi is AT&T of course.  There's a Starbucks directly overhear that you can connect to.  Never had an issue with my order here and staff seems friendly enough.
My default breakfast spot. Always a good treat or meal
Best food and great customer service. Atmosphere is very cozy and relaxed.
Excellent fast service, great food...
The staff are all really nice
The customer service is great

Went there for lunch today and after three tries I still didn't have the correct sandwich.  First, discovered it had tomatoes on it after walking back to my office, so walked back over to get it fixed.  The associate at the counter was not friendly at all when dealing with it, so I asked for a refund.  The manager did come out and give me a refund and was nice.  He asked this associate to make sure I got my sandwich - as soon as he walked away she told me to just go around the corner and pick it up.  Apparently they took my food up front, because another associate came back around and gave it to me.  This time I checked and noticed there was no bacon on it (it was a Bravo Bacon Turkey sandwich), so I go back up to the counter.  This time the associate was nice and even joked around with me about the bacon being the best part.  When I go around to the pick up window one of the girls in the back was arguing with the expo guy saying she did the sandwich right.  If it hadn't been for me saying that it was missing bacon I don't know what they would have done.  This time I took my sandwich and went back to the office because my lunch hour was almost over by now.  When I get to the office, now the sandwich is missing the turkey and there are no chips in the bag.  I called and spoke with the manager who was apologetic and said he would be calling me back within a couple of hours and wanted to get more info at that time so he could get me a gift card.  Never heard back from the manager.  What this boils down to here is I understand we are all human and make mistakes, but for the most part the employees lacked basic customer service skills and had poor attitudes, which made me more upset than the sandwich being wrong.  A smile and saying you're sorry goes a long way.  Have never had this experience at a Panera before, but it was rough.
Friendly, hospitable atmosphere. Great pastries great coffee. Thanks guys!!!!
Food
Great service, good food. Disappointed in portions.
Good food and good service as well. You know what you are going to get when you go to a Panera no matter where it is.
This location is perfect for a quick meal during the work week, and the staff pays close attention to the customer's dining experience
Good food and fast service.  Plenty of seating.  Great study location.
I ordered breakfast for my office 3 days in advance. I arrived at the pick up time and the food was not ready. They also did not have the bagles required to fill my order.
This place has lots of energy and Good Vibes.
Great food and frequent buyer rewards

Good location for a quick lunch, but can get very busy. The kiosks have helped get food quicker, but some people really can't figure then out. I'd say they have really tried to make it as efficient as possible, but can still be hectic
Depending on what day and time you go you're either going to get decent service or someone who looks like this is the last place they want to be working.

The downtown location has very rude staff. They are very argumentative, and some have even rolled their eyes. I have been in here four times and each time am disappointed. As someone who used to work for the company for 3 years, I know what customer service skills should be--this store is not it.
Rapid pick up
Amo. Pratico. Bom preco. Boas saladas e sopas.
Friendly staff. Good chain
Difficult to find a table at the height of lunch hour.  Staff is generally pleasant and the food is presented well.
Had a great Asiago Steak Sandwich and soup. Nice location.
While it can get a little pricey at times (enter the $8 bowl of Mac and cheese) it's quick, healthy and delicious with a variety of souos, salads, pasta and sandwiches
Feels like every other Panera. Food tastes fresh, not too expensive.
Fresh and organic food.
Good lunch place.
Located in downtown Charlotte. This was the meetup location for the Enlightened at the Ingress Abaddon anomaly. It is centrally located.
Quick easy place to get food uptown. Can order online
Very great staff. Food is fresh.  Smoothies are the best and taste fantastic.

I am a HUGE Panera loyalist so this review is hard to write. This location (as well as the location in CMC/Levine hospital down the street) apparently are needing some training as well as system updates, maybe? I placed an order online for rapid pick-up. It was set to be ready in 10 minutes. 17 minutes later I arrived and they had no trace of my order. I showed them the confirmation (still up on my phone screen) and was told they'd make it right then and there. Fine. I go to the front, order breakfast for my mom as well, come back 5 minutes later and I'm told "We're out of that souffle. It'll be about 20 minutes for the next batch." I have to be to work in 20 minutes. Nothing rapid about this here. Then I was told they have a four cheese souffle so I agree to take that instead, only to have the woman turn around and tell me they don't have that either because they're selling it to someone else. Great. I was offered a breakfast sandwich. If I had wanted a breakfast sandwich, I would have ordered one. The manager agreed to cancel my order and issue a refund. This is the SECOND time I've had an issue with this location. I won't return but I suggest you fix it soon, Panera
Good lunch place.
Nice panera in downtown, can get crowded during peak times but that's to be expected for location.  Quick service and fast wifi.
Panera Bread is definitely my go to place for good soup and fast service

A special Panera! Panera's menu is standardized, so how can one location stand out from the others? By having the best service and friendliest people. Also very good attention to cleanliness. Will eat here again.
Just like any Panera Bread. This location has great service and moves quick. I like how coffee has the brew time displayed.
I had amazing customer service at this location. I will be returning.
It's a Panera Bread. Nice in-town location.
They hours end at 8pm Mon- Friday and 6 on the weekends. Google need to update this
parking at this location is notoriously lousy

I like being able to order from a quick order kiosk and picking up my order quickly from takeout, but the quality has diminished.  I found a curly hair sitting on a napkin in the bag with my food as well as unidentifiable debris on the plastic knife to be used to spead my cream cheese!

Panera Bread is always a great choice for quality food at quality prices. A wide selection of paninis, salads, pastas, and baked goods among other things keep me coming back for more. The newly installed tablet order devices cut down on lines and you don't feel pressured by the cashier's scowls into making a quick order while you're browsing the menu.
